translation: n.钉子；指甲；爪vt.钉；抓住；使固定
examples: (1) He hit the nail into the wall with a hammer.(2) I found a nail sticking in the tyre.(3) You can try this nail polish on your nails.(4) She was paring her nails with nail scissors.(5) I will nail up the new pictures on the wall.(6) It's the best chance we have to nail the crime.(7) Police nailed the suspect.(8) Signing the contract will nail down our agreement.(9) See if you can nail him down to an exact date.
(1) 他用一把锤子把钉子打进墙里去。(2) 我发现轮胎上扎着一根钉子。(3) 您可以在指甲上试试这种指甲油。(4) 她正在用指甲刀修指甲。(5) 我会把这些新的图画钉在墙上。(6) 这是我们抓住罪犯的最好机会。(7) 警察抓住了嫌疑犯(8) 在合同上签字将使我们的协议成为定案。(9) 看能否使他决定个确切的日期。

translation: adj.有限的；狭窄的；精密的；度量小的n.海峡；隘路；狭窄部份v.变窄
examples: (1) The shop sells only a narrow range of goods.(2) The heavy traffic crawled through the narrow tunnel.(3) The gate is too narrow for a car.(4) What does the word mean in its narrowest sense?(5) This is an inappropriate and narrow views.(6) A very narrow income has a tendency to contract the mind, and sour the temper.(7) She has very narrow ideas about religion.(8) This is a narrow sea that parts the French and English.(9) Finally the leading ships steamed in at night through the narrow strait.(10) On treacherous terrain or narrow roads, they can be attacked.(11) Toucans also have a narrow, feather-like tongue.(12) They planed to narrow the gap between imports and exports.(13) In order to widen the road they have to narrow the pavement.

(1) 这家商店商品的种类有限。(2) 拥挤的车辆慢吞吞地穿过狭窄的隧道。(3) 大门太窄，汽车进不去。(4) 这个词的最狭义的意思是什麽?(5) 这是不适当的和狭隘的见解。(6) 一种很有限的收入容易使一个人的心胸变窄，脾气变坏。(7) 她对宗教的见解很狭隘。(8) 这是个分开法国和英国的海峡。(9) 最后先头船只在夜间驶入狭窄的海峡。(10) 正通过险道隘路时，可以攻击。(11) 巨嘴鸟也有狭窄部份，像羽毛一样的舌。(12) 他们计划缩小进出口的差额。(13) 为了拓宽道路只好将人行道弄窄。

translation: n.国家；民族
examples: (1) I was told that Spain is a romantic nation.(2) The nation levied all able-bodied man for the war.(3) My judgement was frequently faulty, but my loyalty to the nation could not be questioned.(4) The Jewish nation is scattered around the world.(5) The Chinese are a nation of hardworking.
(1) 有人告诉我说，西班牙是个浪漫的国家。(2) 国家征召所有壮丁参战。(3) 我的判断经常出错，但是我对祖国的忠诚是无可置疑的。(4) 犹太民族散居于世界各地。(5) 中国人是一个勤劳的民族。

translation: adj.民族的；国家的；全国性的；国立的；国有的n.国民（复）nationals: 全国性比赛.
examples: (1) These ancient buildings are part of the national heritage.(2) We must safeguard our national interests.(3) National wealth depends to a high degree on a country's educational standard.(4) Our newspaper is a national newspaper.(5) He graduated from a national university.(6) Sinochem is one of the four national oil companies in China.(7) Almost all the countries have set up some barriers to protect national industries.(8) He's a French national working in Italy.
(1) 这些古建是民族遗产的一部分。(2) 我们必须保卫国家的利益。(3) 国民财富在很大程度上取决于一个国家的教育水准。(4) 我们的报纸是全国性的报纸。(5) 他毕业于一所国立大学。(6) 中国中化集团是中国四大国有石油公司之一。(7) 几乎所有的国家都会通过设置贸易壁垒来保护国有工业。(8) 他是在意大利工作的法国人。

translation: n.国籍；民族
examples: (1) She has dual nationality.(2) She storied about her nationality.(3) There are two main nationalities in our village.(4) The nation will combat all invaders.
(1) 她有双重国籍。(2) 她谎报自己的国籍。(3) 我们村子有两大民族。(4) 这个民族将同所有的入侵者战斗。

translation: adj.全国性的adv.在全国范围内
examples: (1) There was nationwide opposition to the tax hike.(2) We have launched a nationwide forestation campaign.(3) The livestock tax has been rescinded nationwide.
(1) 发生了全国性的反对税收增多。(2) 我们展开了全国性的造林运动。(3) 牧业税已经在全国范围内废除。

translation: adj.本国的；本土的；当地的n.土著；本地人；本国人
examples: (1) He's emigrated to the USA and gone completely native.(2) You can tell from his blue eyes that he isn't native to China.(3) I have often been asked why I am not adopting a Native American.(4) This house was built of native stones.(5) The kangaroo is a native of Australia.(6) He is a Beijing native.
(1) 他已移居美国，完全成了美国人。(2) 你可以从他的蓝眼睛看出他不是中国本土的人。(3) 别人经常问我为什么不领养美国本土的孩子。(4) 这间屋子是用当地的石头建的。(5) 袋鼠是产于澳大利亚的动物。(6) 他是土生土长的北京人。

translation: n.自然界；性质；自然；自然状态；本性；类型
examples: (1) In fact, nature is much better at recycling than we humans are.(2) To a great extent, that is the nature of my own work.(3) Why is the state of nature a state of war?(4) I'm trying to prevent the reversion of my garden to nature.(5) It's her nature to be generous.(6) Cruelty is quite alien to his nature.(7) Both types of organisms are ubiquitous in nature.(8) The nature of the high a drug provides depends on the type of drug.
(1) 事实上,自然界在再循环方面比人类做得更好。(2) 在很大程度上,这就是我工作的性质。(3) 为何自然状态是一种战争的状态？(4) 我正在试图防止我的花园返回一片荒芜的自然状态。(5) 慷慨大方是她的天性。(6) 残忍完全不合他的本性。(7) 在自然界中普遍存在两种类型的生物体。(8) 药物的麻醉程度取决于药物的类型。

translation: n.海军；船队；海军蓝
examples: (1) He is a gunner of the British navy.(2) Beiyang Navy is the earliest naval force of China.(3) The army, navy and airforce are all controlled by the Ministry of Defense.(4) What I have said about the army also applies, mutatis mutandis, to the navy.(5) Britain has always had a large navy, called the Royal Navy.(6) Secretary Stimson urged Roosevelt to order the navy to convoy British and Allied merchant ships all the way from American to British ports.(7) Where's my navy (blue) suit?
(1) 他是英国海军的一名炮手。(2) 北洋水师是中国最早的海军部队。(3) 陆海空军皆由国防部控制。(4) 我谈到的陆军方面,如作适当变动,也适用于海军。(5) 英国一直有一支强大的海军，称为皇家海军。(6) 史汀生部长力促罗斯福下令海军对英国与盟国船队从美国港口到英国港口进行全程护航。(7) 我那套海军蓝的西装在哪儿?

translation: adj.整洁的；简洁的；利索的adv.整洁地；利索地
examples: (1) He has made neat paths and has built a wooden bridge over a pool.(2) The headmaster praised the boys for their neat turn-out.(3) He gave a neat summary of the financial situation.(4) The naughty boy played a neat trick.(5) he slipped the ball back neat.
(1) 他在花园里铺上整洁的小路，并在池塘上架起木桥。(2) 校长表扬男同学服装整齐。(3) 他对财务状况做了简要的概括。(4) 这个淘气的小男孩玩了一个巧妙的花招。(5) 他把球利索地传了回来。

translation: n.领带
examples: (1) Necktie is a proper gift given to a man.(2) Their boss told them that they must wear neckties in the company.
(1) 领带是送给男人的合适的礼物。(2) 他们的老板告诉他们在公司里必须打领带。

translation: n.针vt.用针缝；激怒；嘲弄vi.缝纫
examples: (1) The needle pierced her finger.(2) She pricked herself on a needle.(3) The road looks beautiful covered by golden pine needles.(4) My mother is needling my coat.(5) She tried to needle me into losing my temper.(6) He was always needling me.
(1) 针刺进了她的手指。(2) 她被针扎了一下。(3) 这条路上铺满了金黄色的松针，看上去美极了。(4) 我妈妈在给我缝外套。(5) 她想方设法惹我发脾气。(6) 他一直在嘲弄我。

translation: vi.谈判；协商；交涉vt.谈判达成；成功越过；议价出售
examples: (1) We've decided to negotiate with the employers about our wage claim.(2) We are happy to negotiate with you in that way.(3) Trade union leaders went back to negotiate with the government.(4) Since our contract is near its term we must negotiate a new one.(5) How did you negotiate the deal on the benefit?(6) The climber had to negotiate a steep rock face.
(1) 我们决定就工资问题与雇主谈判。(2) 我们很高兴用这种方式来和贵方协商交易。(3) 工会领导回去和政府进行交涉。(4) 由于我们的合同快到期了，我们必须谈判新的合约。(5) 你是怎么谈成那笔有利可图的交易的?(6) 那攀登者得攀越一陡峭岩石。

translation: n.外甥；侄子
examples: (1) My little nephew is very naughty.(2) He decided to take his nephew abroad.(3) To my surprise, I found my nephew dressed in a girl's skirt.(4) His nephew is an uncouth young man.
(1) 我的外甥特别调皮。(2) 他决定把他的外甥带出国。(3) 令我惊奇的是，我侄子穿着女孩的裙子。(4) 他的侄子是一个粗野的年轻人。

translation: n.巢；窝vt.为 ... 筑巢；嵌入vi.筑巢；寻找鸟巢
examples: (1) The blackbird's nest contained four eggs.(2) The male hunts for food while his mate guards the nest.(3) The bird is building a nest of straw and twigs.(4) The swallow has made a nest under our eaves.(5) The nest held three vigorous young birds.(6) The boy was nesting for the little birds.(7) You can nest up to 64 levels of functions.(8) She nested the glass tumblers in a crate.(9) You can nest one kind of control structure within another kind.(10) The swallows nested under the eaves.(11) There the birds nest and bring up their young.

(1) 黑鹂巢里有四个蛋。(2) 雌性动物守巢时，雄性动物猎食。(3) 这只鸟在用稻草和小树枝筑巢。(4) 燕子在我们的屋檐下垒了一个窝。(5) 这窝里有三只活泼的小鸟。(6) 这个男孩正在为这些小鸟筑巢。(7) 最多可以嵌套64个级别的函数。(8) 她把玻璃酒杯一个套一个放在箱子里。(9) 可以在一种控制结构中嵌套另一种控制结构。(10) 燕子在屋檐下筑巢。(11) 这些鸟在那里筑巢并哺育幼鸟。

translation: n.网；网状物adj.净余的；纯粹的
examples: (1) This area has not been covered by the communication net.(2) My mother bought a lot of net curtains.(3) The net weight of this jar of coffee is 180 grams.
(1) 这个地区还不在通讯网的覆盖之内。(2) 我妈妈买了很多网眼帘布。(3) 这瓶咖啡净重180克。

translation: n.网点；网络；网状系统；广播公司
examples: (1) The fabrics are merchandised through a network of dealers.(2) The Internet is a worldwide computer network.(3) She gave me a diagram of railway network.(4) The broadcast was carried on national network .
(1) 通过经销网点销售纺织品。(2) 因特网是一个全球计算机网络系统。(3) 她给了我一张铁路网图解。(4) 这个节目通过全国广播网进行广播。

translation: n.新西兰
examples: (1) Auckland is the largest city in New Zealand.(2) New Zealand is a marvelous country, isn't it?
(1) 奥克兰是新西兰最大的城市。(2) 新西兰是一个非常奇妙的国家，是吗？

translation: n.新西兰人
examples: (1) The Kiwi is New Zealand's national symbol and New Zealanders refer to themselves as Kiwis.(2) Living in a country with plenty of space and a good climate, New Zealanders love all kinds of sport and outdoor activities.
(1) 几维鸟是新西兰的名族象征，新西兰人也常常把自己称为几维人。(2) 新西兰幅员辽阔，气候宜人，新西兰人喜爱各种各样的运动和户外活动。

translation: n.侄女；外甥女；教士的私生女
examples: (1) Her niece is wearing a bright yellowish skirt.(2) My niece was left in my trust for the weekend.(3) Nancy is staying with her niece for the moment.
(1) 她的侄女穿著一条鲜明的淡黄色裙子。(2) 我受托周末照顾我的外甥女。(3) 南希暂时同她外甥女住在一起。

translation: n.夜晚adj.夜晚的
examples: (1) Night began to fall.(2) We can see the stars at night.(3) With the setting of the sun, night comes silently.(4) Not many people want to be night owls.(5) Do you think you'll go to night school tomorrow night?
(1) 夜幕降临。(2) 夜晚我们可以看见星群。(3) 随着太阳的落下，夜晚悄悄地来到。(4) 不是很多人想当夜猫子。(5) 你明天晚上打算去夜校吗?

translation: 夜总会
examples: (1) The phony glamour of night club soon become stale and boring.(2) I wouldn't want to annoy the bouncer on the door of the night club; he's a nasty piece of work.(3) I don't want you hanging about with that low life down at the night club.(4) He made a career of taking off famous people for night club audiences.
(1) 夜总会那种虚假的荣华不久便失去了新意而使人生厌。(2) 我不想与夜总会那看门的人交往，他是个令人讨厌的家伙。(3) 我不希望你在夜总会里沦落成为一个名声极坏的人。(4) 他在夜总会以给观众表演模仿名人动作或语言为职业。

translation: 十九
examples: (1) They were chatting away nineteen to the dozen.(2) Nobody is as sophisticated as a boy of nineteen who is just recovering from a baby- grand passion.(3) He was born in the nineties of the nineteen century.(4) There are nineteen students in my class.
(1) 他们聊个没完。(2) 谁也不会象十九岁的男孩子那么别扭，他是刚刚要从“大幼儿病”恢复过来的嘛。(3) 他生于十九世纪九十年代。(4) 我班里有十九个学生。

translation: num.九十
examples: (1) He was born in the nineties of the nineteen century.(2) He must be going on for ninety.
(1) 他生于十九世纪九十年代。(2) 他准有九十岁了。

translation: abbr.第几(=拉丁语numero)
examples: (1) abbr.第几(=拉丁语numero)

translation: adj.高贵的；宏伟的；高尚的n.贵族
examples: (1) These few words fully revealed her noble quality.(2) Jim is descended from a noble family.(3) The noble peaks tower into the clouds.(4) His noble example inspired the rest of us to greater efforts.(5) He framed his life according to a noble pattern.(6) It was said that he was from a noble family.(7) He is no longer within the pale of noble society.
(1) 这寥寥数语充分显示了她的高贵品质。(2) 吉姆出身于一个贵族家庭。(3) 壮丽的山峰高耸入云。(4) 他那高尚的榜样激发我们大家更加努力。(5) 他以高尚的模式构筑自己生活的框架。(6) 据说他出身于贵族家庭。(7) 他不再是贵族社会的一员了。

translation: v.点头；打盹；（使）摆动n.点头；同意
examples: (1) She nodded when she passed me in the street.(2) He nodded in agreement with me.(3) The student began to nod off during math class.(4) Trees nod in the wind.(5) She greeted us with a nod of the head.(6) I hope he'll give the nod to the plan.
(1) 她在街上走过我身旁时向我点了点头。(2) 他点头表示同意我的意见。(3) 那学生上数学课的时候开始打盹。(4) 树在风中摇曳。(5) 她向我们点点头打招呼。(6) 我希望他会同意这个计划。

translation: adv.喧闹地
examples: (1) A troop of children rushed in and chased each other noisily.
(1) 一群小孩冲进来，喧闹地彼此追逐。

translation: adj.中途不停的adv.不停(地)
examples: (1) The train goes through without a stop.(2) He can't stop eating sweets - it's just greed!
(1) 火车中途不停。(2) 他不停地吃糖果，就是嘴馋。

translation: adj.非暴力的
examples: (1) adj.非暴力的

translation: adj.正常的；正规的；精神健全的n.常态；标准
examples: (1) Everything is absolutely normal.(2) She refused to conform to the normal social conventions.(3) It was several days before the floodwater sank and life returned to normal.(4) Her temperature is above normal.
(1) 一切完全正常。(2) 她拒绝遵从正常的社会习俗。(3) 过了几天洪水才退,生活恢复了正常。(4) 她的体温高于正常标准。

translation: adv.向北
examples: (1) The gulf extends northwards.(2) The coast sweeps (away) northwards in a wide curve.(3) The escapee ran quickly northwards and cut back to the original place.
(1) 海湾向北方延伸。(2) 海岸呈一大弧形向北伸展。(3) 逃犯迅速向北跑去，然后又突然回到原地。

translation: n.笔记；便条；纸币；音符；票据；注解；音调vt.注意；记录；注解
examples: (1) Students should take notes during the lectures.(2) Seeing nobody at home, he decided to leave a note.(3) I'd like to break this 50 dollars note.(4) You should pay off the note before our next cooperation.(5) Pay attention to the notes on each page;those notes might be the focus of our exam.(6) There was a note of warning in what he said.(7) I failed to note that he had left.(8) Let me note down your address and telephone number.(9) The meaning of this sentence is noted on the lower right part of the page.
(1) 学生们上课应该做笔记。(2) 看到没人在家,他决定留下一个便条。(3) 我想把这张50美元的纸币换开。(4) 在我们下次合作之前,你应该把票据付清。(5) 注意课文每页的注释,它们可能是我们考试的重点。(6) 他的话带有一种警告的口气。(7) 我没有注意到他已经走了。(8) 让我记下你的地址和电话号码。(9) 这句话的意思在书页的右下方有注解。

translation: n.笔记本；笔记本电脑
examples: (1) I record all my thoughts in a notebook.(2) She filled her notebook with sketches.(3) The ultimate big prize will be notebook one!(4) Use this pc, and notebook together.
(1) 我在笔记本上记下我所有的想法。(2) 她在笔记本上画满素描。(3) 终极大奖将是笔记本电脑一台！(4) 这台笔记本电脑和台式电脑你花搭着用吧！

translation: n.小说家
examples: (1) I dreamed of becoming a novelist.(2) He was an unknown novelist then.(3) I put her in the top rank of modern novelist.
(1) 我梦想成为一个小说家。(2) 当时他是位不出名的小说家。(3) 我把她看做是当代第一流的小说家。

translation: adv.现今；现在
examples: (1) Nowadays we rely increasingly on computers for help/to help us.(2) Nowadays people travel in cars rather than carriages.(3) Portable telephones are very popular nowadays.(4) Nowadays, children often prefer watching TV to reading.(5) Nowadays, the poor student has become a rich man.(6) Lasers can be used to perform operations nowadays.(7) Phonograph is no longer used nowadays.(8) It is rare to find such a genius nowadays.(9) Nowadays many people die of cancer.
(1) 现今人们越来越依赖计算机协助工作。(2) 现今人们旅行都坐汽车，而不使用马车。(3) 现今，移动电话非常普及。(4) 如今，儿童常爱看电视而不爱看书。(5) 如今，那个穷学生成了富人。(6) 现在激光可以用来做手术。(7) 留声机现在已不再使用了。(8) 这样的天才现在很少见。(9) 现在有很多人死于癌症。

translation: adv.任何地方都不n.不知道的地方；无处
examples: (1) Nowhere else will you find such a good book.(2) The young girl would go nowhere without her chaperon.(3) That kind of talk will get you nowhere.(4) He's had nowhere to live since his eviction.
(1) 你在其他任何地方都找不到这么好的书。(2) 这个年轻女孩去任何地方都有监护人跟着。(3) 说那种话对你没好处。(4) 他自从被驱逐出住所以来，就一直无处栖身。

translation: adj.原子核的；原子能的；核心的
examples: (1) Nuclear binding energies are strikingly high.(2) The college students are active to crusade against the nuclear weapons.(3) They decided to establish a nuclear power station.(4) A nuclear family consists of parents and their children only.
(1) 原子核的结合能是极大的。(2) 大学生们积极投入开展反对核武器的运 动。(3) 他们决定修建一所核电站。(4) 核心家庭一般只有父母和孩子两代。

translation: adj.麻木的；失去知觉的vt.使麻木；使失去知觉
examples: (1) My fingers were so numb that I could hardly write.(2) I've just been to the dentist and my face is still numb.(3) The anaesthetic made his whole face go numb.(4) His leg was numbed by the intense pain.(5) She was completely numbed by the shock of her father's death.
(1) 我的手指都麻木了几乎不能写字。(2) 我刚刚去看了牙医，脸上现在还没知觉呢。(3) 麻醉药使他的整张脸失去了知觉。(4) 他的腿因剧痛而麻木。(5) 她父亲去世造成的打击使她目瞪神呆.

translation: n.托儿所；保育室；苗圃
examples: (1) Many children under five go to nursery school.(2) She's all for more nursery schools being built.(3) She sent her little son to a nursery when she was working.(4) We bought a small tree at the nursery.
(1) 5岁以下的许多儿童都上幼儿园。(2) 她坚持主张多建托儿所。(3) 她工作的时候就把小儿子送到托儿所。(4) 我们在苗圃买了一棵小树。

translation: n.护理动词nurse的现在分词.
examples: (1) Nursing is a very worthwhile career.(2) The sick boy came round with careful nursing.
(1) 护理工作是很值得干的职业。(2) 那个生病的男孩经过精心护理已经康复了。

translation: n.营养
examples: (1) Variety is not a guarantee of good nutrition.(2) This food provides all the nutrition your dog needs.(3) A balanced diet provides nutrition for your body.
(1) 品种多并不能确保营养好。(2) 本食品含有狗所必须的一切营养。(3) 均衡的食物使你的身体获得营养。

translation: n.【U】尼龙（复数）nylons：女长袜.
examples: (1) This coat is made of nylon.(2) She strung the beads with a fine nylon.(3) Cotton is more comfortable to wear than nylon.
(1) 这件衣服是尼龙的。(2) 她用细尼龙线把珠子串了起来。(3) 棉布比尼龙穿着舒服。

translation: n. 名称，名字；姓名；名誉vt. 命名，任命；指定；称呼；提名；叫出adj. 姓名的；据以取名的n. (Name)人名；(日)滑(姓)；(英)内姆
examples: The committee's name has been acronymed NACA.Rubella is just another name for German measles.She signed the poem with her real name.He refused to disclose his name and address.I greet you in the name of the President.He has lent his name to the lofty cause.That brought discredit on his name.A good name is better than a good girdle.Elton John is a big name in the music business.You can name the bookmark at design time.A string can be supplied to name the file.You can name your pet dog.She was named after her grandmother.Can you name all the plants in this garden?Name the five wealthiest people in the world.

该委员会的名称被缩合成NACA。风疹只是德国麻疹的另一个名称。她在诗后署上了自己的真实姓名。他拒绝透露自己的姓名和地址。我代表总统前来迎接您。他以自己的名义支持这一崇高的事业。那件事使他的名誉受损。名誉胜过金钱。埃尔顿●约翰在音乐发行界是个名人。您可以在设计时命名书签。字符串可以用来命名该文件。你可以给宠物狗起个名字。她是根据她祖母的名字命名的。你能说出这花园里所有植物的名字吗?请说出世界上最富有的五个人的名字。

translation: adj. 自然的；物质的；天生的；不做作的n. 自然的事情；白痴；本位音n. (Natural)人名；(西)纳图拉尔
examples: It is natural that he should fall in love with such a beautiful girl.I prefer to see animals living in their natural state.Leave her alone. She's natural crier.Harriet Smith was the natural daughter of somebody.
他爱上那位美丽的姑娘是很自然的事。我宁愿看处于野生状态的动物。别理她,她是个天生爱哭的人。哈里特·史密斯是一位不知姓名的人的非婚生女。

translation: adj. 近的；亲近的；近似的adv. 近；接近prep. 靠近；近似于
examples: His flat's very near.We will meet in Beijing in the near future.The supermarket is very near to the station.Can you tell me the nearest way to the railway station?We don't have that color in stock, this is the nearest.He is very near and dear to her.He is very near with his money.I found some shops quite near.The Mid Autumn Festival is drawing near.I was near dead with fright.Lisa lives near.His clinic is near the newly-built railway station.He is near forty.My birthday is very near Christmas.Share prices are near their record high of last year.Nobody else comes near her in intellect.The company had staged a strong recovery from a point of near bankruptcy.He must be nearing home by now.The ship is nearing the land.

他的公寓就在附近。在不久的将来，我们将在北京见面。超级市场离车站很近。你能告诉我去火车站最近的路吗？我们现货中没有那种颜色,这是最近似的。他和她很亲近。他花钱很吝啬。我发现附近有几个商店。中秋节快到了。我几乎给吓死了。丽莎生活地很节俭。他的诊所在新建的火车站附近。他年近四十。我的生日离圣诞节很近。股票价格接近去年的最高纪录。谁也赶不上她聪明。该公司已从濒临破产的状态中强劲地恢复过来。他现在一定已经快到家了。这条船快要靠陆地了。

translation: adj. 附近的，邻近的adv. 在附近prep. 在…附近
examples: He usually trades at the nearby supermarket.He roped his horse on a nearby tree.I can hear the hymn from the nearby church.The whole village is up in arms about the proposal to build an airport nearby.His brothers were married and settled down nearby.
他通常在附近的超市购物。他把马拴到附近的一棵树上。我能听到从附近的教堂传来的圣歌。全村强烈反对在附近修建机场的计划。他的兄弟都已结婚，就住在附近。

translation: adv. 差不多，几乎；密切地
examples: Nearly all of them kept aloof from such doctrines.That fever nearly finished him off.He plays golf nearly every weekend.They sat so close that their heads nearly touched.This matter concerns you very nearly.
他们几乎都不接受这种教条。那场热病几乎送了他的命。他差不多每个周末都打高尔夫球。他们坐得那么近，头都差不多碰到一起了。此事与你密切相关。

translation: adj. 必要的；必需的；必然的n. 必需品n. (Necessary)人名；(英)内塞瑟里
examples: She will make necessary arrangements.If necessary, please warehouse the goods.The necessary outcome of a war is a fall in production.
她会作好必要的准备。如有必要，请将该货存入仓库。战争带来的必然结果就是生产力下降。

translation: n. 脖子；衣领；海峡vi. 搂著脖子亲吻；变狭窄vt. 使变细；与…搂著脖子亲吻n. (Neck)人名；(德、意、英)内克
examples: The giraffe is characterized by its very long neck.The neck of my guitar is broken.The doctor operated the patient on the neck.She wears a gold chain around her neck.She only hurt her neck in the accident.The two of them were necking on a park bench.Lovers come here at night to neck.
长颈鹿以其长颈为特徵.我吉他的琴颈坏了。医生给病人的颈部动手术。她脖子上戴着一条金项链。她在事故中只是伤到了脖子。他们俩在公园的长凳上拥抱亲吻。在夜晚，情人们来到这儿拥抱接吻。

translation: n. 项链
examples: I value this necklace at $5,000.The girl is wearing a bead necklace.
我估计这条项链值五千美元。女孩戴了一条珠子项链。

translation: n. 需要，要求；缺乏；必要之物vt. 需要vi. 需要
examples: You look tired. You need a good rest.If I need you to come and help, I'll call you.If the ground is too dry, then you need to water it.You need some warm clothes for the winter.I need to spend more time studying.The doctor told me I was in need of a good rest.I don't have the need for such an expensive car like that.I feel a need to talk to you about it.There isn't much need for further research.We are collecting money for children in need.My neighbors helped me a lot in my time of need.
你看来累了。你需要好好休息一下。如果我需要你来帮忙,我会打电话的。如果地面太干燥,那么你就需要给它浇浇水。冬天来了,你必需准备一些保暖衣物。我必需花更多时间来学习。医生对我说，我需要好好休息。我还不需要一辆那么昂贵的汽车。我觉得有必要跟你谈谈那件事。没有多大必要进行进一步研究。我们在为贫困儿童募捐。我的邻居在我缺衣少食的日子里帮了我很多忙。

translation: n. n. 邻居;同胞；仁慈的人vt. 邻接vi. 住在邻近；毗邻；友善，和睦adj. 邻居的；邻近的
examples: My neighbour is always putting on airs.I'll board out my children with my neighbour.When the big tree fell, it brought down two of its smaller neighbours.The garden neighbours on a golf-course.In front of the house there is a large plot of field, on which neighbours the highway.
我的邻居总是装腔作势。我将把孩子们寄在邻居家膳宿。那棵大树一倒把附近的两棵小树也弄倒了。那花园与高尔夫球场相邻。房子前面有一大片耕地，耕地与公路邻接。

translation: n. 邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带
examples: Our neighbourhood police are very friendly.The whole neighbourhood was reduced to ashes.Contribute to physical and mental health, family harmony, neighbourhood relations, learning and career progress, social harmony and stability.
我们邻近的警察非常友善。整个邻近一带被化为灰烬。有助于身心健康，家庭和睦，邻里关系，学习及事业进步，社会的和谐稳定。

translation: conj. 也不；既不adv. 两个都不；既不……也不adj. 两者都不的pron. 两者都不
examples: Neither of my parents enjoys music.Neither of the statements is true.He tasted both cakes and said that neither was delicious.Neither side is willing to make a move.Neither chair is comfortable.He hasn't got a ticket and neither have I.A good watch neither gains nor loses.The hotel is neither spacious nor comfortable.He can neither read nor write.Neither he nor I am able to understand her.
我父母都不喜欢音乐。两种说法都不正确。他两块蛋糕都尝了尝,觉得都不好吃。双方都不愿采取行动。两把椅子坐起来都不舒服。他没有票，我也没有。好表不快也不慢。这旅馆既不宽敞也不舒服。他既不会读也不会写。既不是我也不是他能够了解她。

translation: adj. 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的
examples: The doctors shall operate on his central nervous system.He is suffering from nervous tension.They can also help come calm and control nervous horses and got cheap guard sheep and gots goats on farms.The merest little thing makes him nervous.I have never seen anyone so nervous. He was sweating like a pig as he waited for the results of the interview.
医生们将要对他的中枢神经系统动手术。他正受神经紧张之苦。它们也可以使紧张焦虑的马平静下来，它们同样可以保卫绵羊和山羊。最微不足道的小事也会使他紧张。我从未看到过这么紧张的人。他在等待面试结果时，紧张得满身大汗。

translation: adv. 从未；决不
examples: I will never forget your kindness.In these altitudes snow never melts.His love for science will never die.We will never yield to invaders.We never flinch from difficulties.She would never thrash her children.She never goes to the cinema.I never miss a chance of playing football.He had no sense of shame and never felt guilty.He has never heard of that before.I have never made his acquaintance.
我永远忘不了你的好意。在这样的高度，雪永不融化。他对科学的热爱永不会消退。我们绝不会向侵略者屈服。在困难面前我们决不退缩。她绝不会鞭打她的孩子。她向来不看电影。我从不错过踢足球的机会。他毫无羞耻之心，而且从不觉得内疚。他未曾听说过那事。我与他素昧平生。

translation: adj. 新的，新鲜的；更新的；初见的adv. 新近n. (New)人名；(英)纽
examples: I'll just sew up that tear, and the coat will be as good as new.They sell new and used furniture.The book seemed to open up before me a new world.There is nothing new under the sun.She is new to this country.Our system is probably new to you.
我把大衣的破处缝好，就会完好如新了。他们出售新旧家具。那本书好象在我面前揭示出一个崭新的世界。太阳底下没有新鲜的事。她对这个国家还不熟悉。你也许不熟悉我们的系统。

translation: 纽约
examples: He drove all the way through to New York.
他一直开到纽约。

translation: n. 新闻，消息；新闻报导
examples: Have you read the news about the election?She tapped out a news story on the typewriter.I heard it on the 7 o'clock news.I haven't heard any news from my son lately.The news comes from a reliable source.
你看了关于选举的新闻了吗？她用打字机打出一篇新闻报道。我在七点钟的新闻报道中听到了这则消息。我最近没听到我儿子的任何音讯。这消息来自可靠的来源。

translation: n. 报纸报社旧报纸
examples: He unfurled the newspaper and began to read.I learned this news from the newspaper.Only when he read the newspaper did he know the story.His name leapt out at me from the newspaper.We have subscribed to an evening newspaper.The associated press reported that as a result of glossy paper costs higher than the average newsprint, not to advertisements, the newspaper is not possible for a new look.
他展开报纸开始阅读。我从报纸上得知这个消息。他看了报纸后才知道那则报导。报纸上他的名字一下子跳入我的眼帘。我们已经订阅了一份晚报。美联社报道，由于光面纸成本比普通新闻纸高，没有拉到广告，这家报纸不可能改版。

translation: adv. 然后；下次；其次adj. 下一个的；其次的；贴近的n. 下一个prep. 靠近；居于…之后
examples: If I miss this train I'll catch the next one.Let's pass on to the next item on the agenda.The next best thing would be to tell him the truth.She's in the room next door to her parents.There was a burst of laughter in the next room.Next, there was the matter of her clothes.They wrangled over what to do next.Next, the wheat is ground into flour at the mill.What will you do next?
如果我错过了这班火车，就赶乘下一班。咱们进行议事日程的下一个项目吧。其次，最好的办法就是把真相告诉他们。她住在她父母隔壁的那个房间。隔壁房间里突然爆发出一阵笑声。其次，还有她的服装问题。他们就接下来该干什么而争吵。然后，麦子在磨坊里被磨成面粉。接下来你要干什么？

translation: adj. 精密的；美好的；细微的；和蔼的n. (Nice)人名；(英)尼斯
examples: It's a nice day today.How nice of you to do that!I brought her a very nice present from Soochow.People there are very nice to tourists and foreigners.Did you have a nice holiday?There is a nice distinction between the two words.
今天天气很好。你那样做真是太好了！我从苏州给她带来一件美妙的礼物。那儿的人们对待旅行者和外国人都非常友好。你假期过得愉快吗？这两个词有细微的区别。

translation: n. 九，九个num. 九；九个adj. 九的，九个的n. (Nine)人名；(塞)尼内
examples: I'll leave for Shanghai at nine.I have nine dolls in the bedroom.Nine people came in and the remainder stayed outside.Are you sure you can come by at nine?I arrive at the hospital at eight o'clock, but I don't go on duty until nine.
九点钟，我将赴上海。我的卧室里有九个布娃娃。9个人进来，余下的人留在外面。你肯定你九点能来吗？我八点钟就到医院了，但是九点钟我才去值班。

translation: num. 第九adj. 第九的；九分之一的n. 九分之一
examples: My house is the ninth on the right side.I heard the Ninth Symphony played last night.One ninth of the products have defects.
我的房子是右边第九幢。昨晚我听了第九交响乐的演奏。九分之一的产品有毛病。

translation: adv. 不adj. 没有；不是n. 不；否决票abbr. 数字（number）；元素锘（nobelium）的符号n. (No)人名；(柬)诺；(越)努
examples: The sick man is no better.You are very selfish sometimes.---No,I'm not.He has no money.There is no water on the moon.It is no joke.I am no match for him.No smoking.No talking in class.It's time for us to say "No" to America.A mature person should learn to say 'No'.He responded no to the teacher's question.The noes have it.There were more noes than yeses to the proposal.
那病人一点也没有好转。你有时很自私的。--不,我不自私。他没有钱。月球上一点水也没有。这可不是开玩笑的事。我绝不是他的对手。禁止吸烟。上课中禁止讲话。是我们对美国说不的时候了。一个成熟的人应该知道拒绝别人。他对老师的问题作了否定的回答。投反对票者占多数。对于这个提议,否决票比赞成票要多。

translation: pron. 无人，没有人；没有任何人n. 无名小卒；小人物
examples: She has almost nobody to take up for her.Nobody likes to live in that desert region.
她几乎没有人支持。没有人喜欢生活在那个沙漠地区。

translation: n. [环境] 噪音；响声；杂音vt. 谣传vi. 发出声音；大声议论n. (Noise)人名；(英)诺伊斯
examples: The loud noise from the nearby factory chafed him.The dog perked its ears at the noise.There is so much noise in this restaurant; I can hardly hear you talking.A loud noise from the street diverted my attention.The noise interrupted my train of thought.The least noise would startle the timid child.It was noised abroad that his company had gone bankrupt.There was a ceaseless noise of machinery.If you don't stop making that noise I'm going to lose my patience.
附近工厂的噪声使他烦燥。一听到噪声，狗就竖起了耳朵这个餐厅里太嘈杂了，我几乎听不到你说话。街上一阵喧闹声转移了我的注意力。喧闹声打断了我的思路。最小的响声也会吓着这个胆小的孩子的。外面谣传他的公司已破产。机器不停地发出噪音。你要再不停止发出噪音，我可要火了。

translation: adj. .嘈杂的；喧闹的；聒噪的
examples: I prefer the quiet countryside to the noisy cities.He was notorious for his noisy parties in the town.I have got accustomed to noisy sound.These noisy conditions aren't really conducive to concentrated work.The bus was packed with noisy schoolchildren.She froze her noisy children with a single look.
我喜欢安静的乡村胜过喧闹的城市。因为他搞了多次喧闹的晚会，所以他在镇上声名狼藉。我已习惯于嘈杂声音。这嘈杂的环境实在不利于专心工作。这辆公共汽车里挤满了吵吵嚷嚷的小学生。她一瞪眼,她吵闹的孩子们马上动也不敢动。

translation: pron. 没有人；一个也没有；没有任何东西adj. 没有的，一点没有的adv. 决不，一点也不n. (None)人名；(葡、罗)诺内；(日)野根(姓)
examples: None could produce a simple, tidy answer.None of us like to go skate in winter.None of them dares even mutter dissent.I wanted some string but there was none in the house.These articles are second to none.My car is none the worse for the accident.The choir sang sweetly, and none more so than the Welsh boy.
没有人能提出一个简单而又令人满意的答案。我们之中没有人愿意在冬天去滑冰。没有人敢说半个不字。我需要一些绳子，但家里一根也没有。这些物品不逊于任何东西。我的汽车遇到事故，但毫无损坏。唱诗班唱得很悦耳，尤其是没人比得上那个威尔士男孩儿。

translation: n. 面条；笨蛋
examples: The noodle is in the shape of a waistbelt.Please put more minced meat into my noodle soup.
面条像腰带。请给我的面条里多加些肉末。

translation: n. 中午；正午；全盛期n. (Noon)人名；(朝)嫩；(英、巴基)努恩
examples: At noon, the sun is high in the sky.We need to be there before noon.She anchors a 45-minute news show at noon.We were through with the work towards noon.
正午，烈日当空。我们要在正午前赶到那儿。她每天中午主持四十五分钟的新闻广播。将近中午时我们把工作做完了。

translation: conj. 也不；也不是adv. 也不；也没有n. (Nor)人名；(中)挪(广东话·威妥玛)；(马来、俄)诺尔；(柬)诺
examples: It is neither hot nor cold in winter here.He's neither an electrician nor a mechanic.Neither he nor I have free time.We neither moved nor made any noise.It is neither hot nor cold in winter here.He's neither an electrician nor a mechanic.Neither he nor I have free time.We neither moved nor made any noise.
这里冬天既不热也不冷。他既不是电工也不是技工。他没有闲功夫，我也没有闲功夫。我们没有动也没有出声。这里冬天既不热也不冷。他既不是电工也不是技工。他没有闲功夫，我也没有闲功夫。我们没有动也没有出声。

translation: n. 北，北方adj. 北方的；朝北的adv. 在北方，向北方
examples: Such fish is rarely met with in the north country.North America has the world's best climate for wild grapes.The river turns north at this point.The river near the woods tends north.It is unnatural for birds to fly north in the winter.Our course was straight to the north.The wasteland of the north is scarcely populated.The wind has veered round to the north recently.South is opposite north on a compass.
这种鱼在北方难得看到。北美的气候是世界上最适合野生葡萄生长的。这条河从这里转向北方。树林边的河流向北方。鸟儿在冬天飞向北方是反常的。我们是朝正北方向航行。北方的大荒原地广人稀。近日风向已转北了。罗盘上南与北是相对的。

translation: adj. 东北的；向东北的；来自东北的n. 东北adv. 向东北；来自东北
examples: At this point the road turns northeast.The Northeast is the granary of the country.It is a strategic pass to the northeast.Hereby he is presenting the fellows in Northeast China.They voyaged northeast for several days.Another ocean current flows northeast along the steep continental shelf.
路在这里转向东北。东北是祖国的粮仓。这里是通往东北的要隘。在这里他向我们呈现的是东北的父老乡亲。他们向东北航行了几天。还有一股沿陡峭陆架坡向东北流动的海流。

translation: adj. 北部的；北方的n. 北部方言
examples: That's a large city in northern Greece.The people of northern Canada are called Inuit.The United Kingdom consists of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.She has travelled in northern countries.The northern face of the mountain is almost vertical.Do you prefer northern food or southern food?The Northern men were hard to beat.
那是希腊北部的一个大城市。加拿大北部的人称为因纽特人。联合王国由大不列颠和北爱尔兰组成。她曾游历过北方诸国。这座山向北的一面几乎是垂直的。你喜欢北方的食物还是南方的食物?北方人是不容易被击败的。

translation: adj. 西北的；向西北的；来自西北的n. 西北adv. 在西北；向西北；来自西北
examples: There is a large hilly area in the northwest.The city is located in the northwest part of Canada.The park is northwest from the city.A cold wind blew from northwest.The tourists drove northwest.
西北部有一大片丘陵地带。这座城市位于加拿大的西北部。公园在该市的西北。冷风从西北方向吹来。游客们开车向西北而去。

translation: n. 鼻子；嗅觉；突出的部分；探问vt. 嗅；用鼻子触vi. 小心探索着前进；探问
examples: He quirked up his nose to make a face.I wrinkled up my nose at the nasty smell.The child pressed her nose against the window.Insert the nose of the staple remover firmly under the staple.This dog has a wonderfully good nose.He has a good nose for a secret.His nose told him that he was getting near the cow shed.The dog nosed out a rat.If there is anything wrong with the car, he can nose it out.I'll go and nose about for more news.Don't nose into other people's affairs.That man will nose out a scandal anywhere.
他鼻子一扬作了个鬼脸。我闻到那股难闻的味，皱起了鼻子。那小女孩把鼻子贴在窗户上。将起钉机的尖端牢固地插在缝合钉的下面。这只狗嗅觉特灵。他对秘密有好的嗅觉。他的嗅觉告诉他, 他正走近牛棚。那只狗闻到了老鼠的气味。要是汽车出了什么毛病，他就能觉察出来。我们去打听一下更多的消息。别干涉他人的事。那个人在什么地方都会探听出丑闻。

translation: adv. 表示否定，不n. “非”（计算机中逻辑运算的一种）
examples: I'm not really sure.It's not your fault.We are not teachers.They will not agree.Not everyone likes this book.David did not have a book to his name.His new book did not come up to expectation.He was not unlearned in history.Fortune has not always smiled on him.
我不太清楚。不是你的错。我们不是老师。他们不会同意。并不是每个人都喜欢这本书。大卫没有一本属于他自己的书。他的新作没有达到预期水平。他对历史并非无知。命运之神并非总是对他微笑。

translation: neg. 没什么；毫不n. 无；零；不关紧要之事adv. 毫不；决不pron. 无事；无物int. 什么也没有
examples: The sound faded into nothing.Two minus two leaves nothing.His latest play is nothing.She is an interesting person but her husband is a real nothing.This will help you nothing.It's nothing like what it used to be.
声音逐渐消失了。二减二等于零。他的新戏一文不值。她是个很有趣的人，但是她的先生却一无是处。这对你毫无帮助。这完全不是老样子。

translation: n. 通知，布告；注意；公告vt. 通知；注意到；留心vi. 引起注意
examples: He walked so fast that he didn't notice his wife.I notice you aren't quite convinced.As soon as your application is approved, I will personally notice you.Information maybe revised without prior notice.Her appearance attracted my notice.Meal times are shown on the notice board.I posted a notice about it on the bulletin board.
他走得太快了,连他夫人都没注意到。我感到你还不太相信。核发登记证时我会通知您。数据如有修改,恕不另行通知。她的外表引起了我的注意。告示牌上写有用餐时间。我把有关那件事的通告贴在布告栏上。

translation: adj. 新奇的；异常的n. 小说n. (Novel)人名；(法、西、英)诺韦尔
examples: The novel is considered a brilliant performance.I like reading novels in my spare time.This film is based on a novel by D.H.Lawrence.It's a novel idea.It's a novel experience.
这部小说被认为是出色的佳作。我喜欢闲暇时读小说。这部影片是根据D.那是个异常的想法。那是一段新奇的经历。

translation: n. 十一月
examples: They will get married in November.November is the high tourist season for southeast Asia.
他们十一月要结婚。十一月是东南亚旅游的旺季。

translation: adv. 现在；如今；立刻adj. 现在的n. 现在；目前conj. 由于；既然
examples: It is now possible to put a man on the moon.He is writing a letter now.Now you see I am telling you the truth.You can click here to download the file now.Gas is now widely used for cooking and heating.The mystery has now come to light.The boss is being in royal spirits right now.Now he slept quietly with his fathers.Now all are participating in this.She had now a life filled also with a beneficent activity.Now, a living language has been found that can play the same intermediary role more successfully.The tools now exist to draw together related material from different domains in a network environment.
目前已能将人送到月球上。他现在正在写信。现在你明白我对你讲的是真话了。你可以点击这里立刻下载文件。现在普遍用煤气烧饭和取暖。这个秘密现在已被揭开了。此刻，老板情绪极好。此刻他安静地躺在祖坟中。目前的事大家都插手了。她目前的生活里善行颇多。最近，已找到了一种现存的语言，它能更有效地起到中间媒介的作用。现存的工具是在网络的环境下从不同的领域同时描绘相关的材料。

translation: n. 数；（杂志等的）期；号码；数字；算术vi. 计入；总数达到vt. 编号；计入；数…的数目；使为数有限
examples: He picked a winning number on the first draw.I slipped up and gave you the wrong phone number.The number of fish in coastal waters has decreased.The number of your finger is ten.He painted the number out on the door.The students of our department numbered in the hundreds.That record numbers among the top ten.This procedure can be used to number any type of document.That record numbers among the top ten.This procedure can be used to number any type of document.I am proud to number him among my friends.
他第一次便抽到一个中奖号码。我粗心大意给错了你电话号码。沿海鱼的数量已减少了。你双手手指的总数是10。她用漆涂掉了门上的数字。我们系的学生总共有几百人。那张唱片列入前十名之中。此过程可用于对任何类型的文档进行编号。那张唱片列入前十名之中。此过程可用于对任何类型的文档进行编号。把他算作我的朋友，我感到自豪。

translation: vt. 看护，护理；照顾；培养；给…喂奶vi. 照料，护理；喂奶；当保姆n. 护士；奶妈，保姆n. (Nurse)人名；(英)纳斯
examples: A nurse came to put on a clean dressing for him.The nurse diluted the drug with saline water.The nurse is preparing the child to go to hospital.We'll have to put the baby to nurse.You need a housekeeper to nurse your property.This disease is very hard to nurse.He insisted on staying up to nurse the child.
一位护士来给他包上干净的绷带。护士用生理盐水把药加以稀释。保姆正在为孩子住院作准备。我们只能请人照看婴孩。你需要雇用一名管家来精心料理你的家产。这种病很难护理。他坚持不懈来护理这个小孩。

translation: n. 螺母，螺帽；坚果；难对付的人，难解的问题vi. 采坚果n. (Nut)人名；(阿拉伯)努特；(柬)努
examples: He carefully cracked a nut and then give it to me.The little boy is trying to crack the shell open to get at the nutWhen we turn the nut, we raise or lower the bob.He soon came up with a nut which had fallen off.She's a tough nut to crack; I don't think she'll give us permission.The kids are nutting in the forest like squirrels.
他仔细敲开一颗坚果,然后递给了我。这个小男孩在使劲敲破外壳取得果仁。我们一转动螺母，就会升高或降低摆锤。一会儿他来了，拿着一颗脱落下来的螺帽。她这个人不好说话，我想她不会答应我们的。孩子们像小松鼠一样在森林里采集坚果。

translation: 几乎，差不多；紧挨着；居于…之后
examples: A common wall links the house to its neighbour.He saw a magazine on the table next to him.He parked his car close to the curb.She sat in the chair next to mine.
一堵共用的墙将邻近的两所房连接起来。他看见他邻近桌上有一本杂志。他将汽车停在紧靠人行道路缘的地方。她坐在紧靠着我的一张椅子上。

translation: adv. 无疑地；很可能地
examples: No doubt her death is related to politics.No doubt the chairman will want one last change.No doubt she'll call us when she gets there.She had no renowned ancestors and thought people who had were snobs.
她的死无疑和政治有关。无疑地主席意志需要一最后的变化。她到达那儿时必定会给我们打电话。她没有显赫的祖先，于是以为有的人必定势利。

translation: 不再
examples: This film ticket is no longer available.
这张电影票不再有效。

translation: 不比…多；不再（等于no more）
examples: I will not take any more of your time.Thereafter we heard no more of this suggestion.
我不再占用你的时间了。此后这个建议不再有人提起了。

translation: 一点也不；别客气
examples: The witness lost all remembrance of the accident.Her so-called friend did not offer any help.Should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
这位目击者对这个事故一点也不记得了。她那位所谓的朋友一点也不帮忙。如果您有什么问题的话，请不必客气，尽管与我们联系。

translation: 不仅...而且...
examples: Not only did he turn up late, he also forgot his books.If this project fails it will affect not only our department, but also the whole organization.
他不但来迟了，还忘了把书带来。要是这个项目失败了，这将不仅影响到我们部门，还会影响到整个单位。

translation: 偶尔；有时
examples: He fluctuated between hope and despair.Her moods kept changing,now happy, now sad.And she litters from time to time.She stumbled and halted in her utterance.
他时而充满希望时而失望。她的情绪总是变幻不定，时而欢喜，时而忧伤。还不时随手扔垃圾。她说话结结巴巴，还不时停顿。

translation: 既然；由于
examples: Now that I am free, I can enjoy music for a while.The days are closing in now that it is autumn.Power shortage browned out the city that winter.Seeing that nobody was at home, I had to leave.
既然有空，我可以享受一下音乐。既然已经是秋天，白昼越来越短了。那年冬天，由于电力不足，市里采取了部分停电供应措施。由于没人在家，我也只好走了。
